text: Porcellio rufobrunneus is a species of woodlouse from the Porcellionidae family. The scientific name of this species was first published in 1923 by Omer-Cooper.Schotte, M. (2010). Porcellio rufobrunneus Omer-Cooper, 1923. In: Schotte, M., Boyko, C.B, Bruce, N.L., Poore, G.C.B., Taiti, S., Wilson, G.D.F. (Eds) (2010). World Marine, Freshwater and Terrestrial Isopod Crustaceans database. Based on information from the World Register of Marine Species, found at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=262436 ==References== Category:Porcellionidae
title: Porcellio rufobrunneus
